option.name: reverseproxy_host
option.description: domain name which be used in the reverse proxy

option.name: reverseproxy_edit_host
option.description: domain name which be used in the reverse proxy for the non cached host

option.name: reverseproxy_scheme
option.description: HHTP(s) scheme of the reverse proxy (http/https)

option.name: with_binding_json
option.description: Json python various bindings (demjson, simplejson) y/n

option.name: with_binding_mapscript
option.description: mapserver python bindings, see http://pypi.python.org/pypi/mapscript y/n

option.name: with_binding_pdf
option.description: PDF Python various bindings including pypdf Y/n

option.name: with_tool_cgeneric
option.description: include a bundle of collective.generic development tools y/n

option.name: with_ploneproduct_csvreplica
option.description: CSV Replicata, see http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Products.csvreplicata (makina users, do not untick) y/n

option.name: with_ploneproduct_cz3cformgrok
option.description: Plone + z3cform light grok integration, see http://pypi.python.org/pypi/collective.z3cform.grok y/n

option.name: with_ploneproduct_fivegrok
option.description: five.grok integration, see http://pypi.python.org/pypi/five.grok (dangerous to disable) y/n
